landing.hero.description: Ku sami ƙwarewar kula da lafiya kamar yadda ba a taɓa gani ba tare da mai taimakon lafiya na AI. Ku sami bayanan lafiya na musamman, ku shirya alƙawura, kuma ku sarrafa tafiyar lafiyar ku—duk a wuri ɗaya.
